channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Biggest Losers From High U.S. Rates Might Be Abroad
item.description: Though the European economy is far weaker, central banks there might keep following the Federal Reserve’s cue.

item.title: U.S. Stock Futures Slip
item.description: There are signs stocks could end the Christmas week on a downbeat note. Meanwhile, the political turmoil in South Korea is weighing on its stock marke...

item.title: 12 cheap small-cap stocks ready to knock large-caps down to size
item.description: Small-cap stocks typically outperform when investors value large-caps more.

item.title: Oil prices rise as Israeli strikes against Yemen’s Houthis triggers ‘fear bid’
item.description: Oil prices climbed on Friday as Israeli strikes against Yemen’s Houthi rebels triggered what one strategist described as a “fear bid” for the commodit...

item.title: Foreign brands are back in China. But the economy has cooled and domestic competition is dug-in.
item.description: Experts told MarketWatch the key to connecting with Chinese customers is being willing to depart from home-market strategies and embracing local taste...

item.title: Euro Recovery Might Take Time
item.description: The euro was up slightly against the dollar and Societe Generale said it might take some time to recover against the greenback given unfavorable short...

item.title: European Yields Rise Amid Low Trading Volumes
item.description: European government bond yields rose during thin trading volumes over the Christmas period.

item.title: Netflix's Big Game Is Just Getting Started
item.description: The company’s foray into live sports caps a strong year, but the stock’s rich valuation sets a high bar for a follow-up act.

item.title: A ‘best of’ list might be OK for a movie — but to find star money managers?
item.description: How to tell when the ‘best’ is no better than the rest.

item.title: Netflix livestreamed a Beyoncé concert, and a football game broke out
item.description: Singer’s audience numbers top those for the NFL games themselves as viewers unwrap Christmas Day double-header football package.
